<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Shroud](/Feats.aspx?ID=2877) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 48 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per turn

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756), [Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755)

**Requirements**
Your most recent action was to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) from a spell slot or make a [Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755) with a spell from a spell slot.

</column>

---

Your magic has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell. When you take this feat, choose three of [_false vitality_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1523), [_fire shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1529), [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1531), [_flicker_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1532), [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1577), [_mountain resilience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1610), and [_see the unseen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663). You use [Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756) and are subject to an additional aftereffect spell of your choice from the three you selected. This aftereffect spell’s duration lasts until the end of your next turn or its normal duration, whichever is shorter. Using Arcane Shroud again ends any existing spell you gained from Arcane Shroud.
